title: Accelerating the seventies
creator_credit: Sterling Educational Films and Fred A Niles Communications Centre
brief_description: A visual description of the progress and potential problems of the rapid advancements of the 1970’s. Using rapid-fire cutting techniques the sense of pace of unchecked growth and its potential is transmitted to the viewer.
